text: George William Russell (/rʌsəl/; born 15 February 1998) is a British race car driver, currently competing in Formula One for Mercedes. == Racing record == === Wins === * 2022 São Paulo Grand Prix (Interlagos) * 2024 Austrian Grand Prix (Spielberg) * 2024 Las Vegas Grand Prix (Las Vegas) Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:British Formula One drivers Category:Sportspeople from Norfolk Category:People from King's Lynn
title: George Russell (racing driver)
